name: Fragile Soft Machines
description:
You were born to fly, but you never will. As a butterfly with a torn wing, traverse the land in a way you were never meant to, as you journey to find your place in a world that has rejected you. Your choices will affect your journey as well as the world around you.

Fragile Soft Machines features:

  • Environmental changes based on player choices.
  • Branching story line with multiple endings.
  • Player input and writing prompts with visual responses.

    • NEW: French Translation by Joachim Despland

    If you like my work, please consider supporting me either by leaving a tip here or becoming my patron. Your support helps me make more games!


    "Fragile Soft Machines... so easily expresses the loss of beauty" - Chris Priestman (Kill Screen)"Fragile Soft Machines offers the player a chance to think about life and struggling with one's shortcomings." - Lena LeRay (IndieGames.com)

    "...in a medium where achievement hunting is a popular pastime and the perfect ending always attainable, the reminder that in order to move on one must accept loss is startling." - Melody Lee ((The) Absolute)
